EmailTemplate.description: Notify applicant their plan review has been scheduled v2
EmailTemplate.name: POWTS Plan Review Scheduled v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Plan Review Schedule Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today}
Dear {!Request__c.Applicant_Full_name__c},
This letter serves as a confirmation of your review appointment on {!DATEVALUE(Request__c.Start_Time__c)}.
If You Need To Contact Us To Cancel, Reschedule, Or Correct Information:
Please let us know via email to DspsSbPlanSchedule@wi.gov as soon as possible.
To Monitor The Continued Status Of Your Plan:
Plans status can be readily checked on your eSLA dashboard at https://eSLA.wi.gov.
Sincerely,
Department of Safety and Professional Services
